review: I bought this to stream Netflix but after I installed it I read the reviews rating the Fire Stick and Netflix, which were horrible. Instead I use it to watch Amazon Prime, which I love.  One other problem with the Fire Stick was it arriving with German as it's default language.  Customer service at Amazon walked me through re-setting it and then I was able to change to English.
author: JoanneB

review: I bought this on a whim mostly because I wanted to be able to stream videos through Amazon without using my xbox live.  Boy am I glad that I did.  This fire tv stick has exceeded every expectation that I had.  I now have 3 of them for each TV in my house and I bought my mom one as well.- Easy and quick set-up- Plugs easily into any HDMI input.- Comes with HDMI extender just in case you need this- Can easily stream from many different sources such as Hulu, Netflix, and Amazon prime, of course- Menu just for Prime content so you can easily see free movies etc
